column5: Private, comfy, cozy apartment. Close to DFW. 4 rooms - Combined living/dining area,1 Bedroom, 1 full bath, Kitchenette. Queen bed. Twin airbed. Includes coffeepot, microwave/convection oven, dishwasher, refrigerator, utensils, dishes, glassware, pots and pans.  We have a 32 inch flatscreen television with Direct TV.  \
column8: Comfy Private Upstairs Apt near DFW & ATT Stadium
